name: justin.tv cleaned up channel view
description:
Removes all clutter on channel views and fixes some design bugs.

Easy adjustable chat column width for fitting your browsers window width (see CSS code for info and howto).

* 2010-02-23: Removed the Status notification (timeouts, etc) overlay popup thing, too.
* 2010-03-23: This annoying auss–… erm ;) This annoying iPhone spam is gone.

PLEASE REMEMBER: After updating you need to set the width (as described above) again.
